summary.span: 提供在单个子元素（如 或 ）上或周围应用效果的元素的基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for elements that apply effects onto or around a single child element, such as or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A包含单个，其中指定属性。A contains a single , which is specified by the property. 影响，或将修饰， 。The affects, or decorates, the . 可能或可能没有外观的外观。The may or may not have an appearance. 例如，将一个控件周围的矩形但具有不会显示出来。For example, a puts a rectangle around a control, but a has no visual presence. ## Examples 下面的示例添加属性。The following example adds a the property of a . **请注意**[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]示例版本可以使用``标记的内容，但不需要由于适用到属性。**Note** The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] version of the example could use the `` tags around the content of the , but it is not necessary because the applies the to the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[XAML 概述 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md)。For more information, see [XAML Overview (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md). [!code-xaml[Border_snip#SimpleBorderWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Border_snip/CS/simpleborder.xaml#simpleborderwholepage)] [!code-csharp[Border_Procedural_snip#BasicBorderCodeExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Border_Procedural_snip/CSharp/BasicBorderExample.cs#basicbordercodeexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[Border_Procedural_snip#BasicBorderCodeExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Border_Procedural_snip/visualbasic/basicborderexample.vb#basicbordercodeexamplewholepage)] 前面的示例生成类似于下图的输出。The preceding example produces output that is similar to the following illustration. ![具有黑色边框的 TextBox](~/add/media/layout-border-around-textbox.png "具有黑色边框的 TextBox")![TextBox with black border](~/add/media/layout-border-around-textbox.png "TextBox with black border") 文本框边框Border around a TextBox

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为可以在其子集合中有一个子对象，此属性始终报告 0 或 1。Because a can have only one child object in its child collection, this property always reports 0 or 1.
